Class Utility

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread

        • com.fusionlab.driver.BaseClass
          • com.fusionlab.utilities.Utility
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Utility
extends BaseClass
    This class can be used to perform common operation on both android and iOS.

    Vikas Kumar
